channel.title: Paintball Live
channel.description: Paintball LIVE. From the woods and fields to the tournaments and scenarios. Covering all of paintball as only they can; completely unfairly and mentally unbalanced. Live video rebroadcasts, clips and event coverage available 24 hours a day at www.pblive.tv
channel.itunes:subtitle: Every Wednesday at 7pm PT / 10pm ET Paintball LIVE brings you the BEST paintball show on the net; from woods players to the tops in the professional ranks. With special guests, news, events, video and uploads, PBLive is a no B.S., kickass show!
channel.itunes:summary: Every Wednesday at 7pm PT / 10pm ET Paintball LIVE brings you the BEST paintball show on the 'net; from woods players to the tops in the professional ranks. With special guests, news, events, live callers, video and uploads, PBLive is a no B.S., kickass show!
channel.itunes:author: The PbLIVE Crew
channel.itunes:keywords: PbLive, Paintball, Paintball Live, podcast, scenario, tournament, paint ball, splat, extreme sport
